text: Richard Holt Madeley (born 13 May 1956) is an English journalist, actor, television presenter and writer. Along with his spouse Judy Finnigan, he presented ITV breakfast shows This Morning, Good Morning Britain, Channel 4 talk show Richard and Judy and Channel 5's The Wright Stuff. Madeley's solo projects include the ITV series Fortune: Million Pound Giveaway and his stand- in for The Chris Evans Breakfast Show on BBC Radio 2. title: Richard Madeley
